Class LocalFileSystemStore

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalFileSystemStore()
      Creates a new storage service on the local file system using default Json serialization.

      Creates a new storage service on the local file system using the given serializer.

      • store

        public void store(java.lang.String path,
                  Storable obj)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Stores the given object at the given path. The object is serialized using the configured serializer.
        Parameters:
        path - The local file system path.
        obj - The object to store.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a problem occurs storing the object.

      • store

        public void store(java.io.File file,
                  Storable obj)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Stores the given object at the given file location. The object is serialized using the configured serializer.
        Parameters:
        file - The local file system location to store the object.
        obj - The object to store.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a problem occurs storing the object.

      • recall

        public <T> T recall(java.lang.String path,
                    java.lang.Class<T> type)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the object stored in the local file system at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The local file system path.
        type - The type of object being retrieved.
        Returns:
        The object retrieved from the store.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a problem occurs retrieving the object.
